title: Make [Ctrl]+[Delete] work like it works in text editors
body: In current tech preview it is possible to delete a whole word by using [Ctrl]+[Backspace] which is great! Unfortunately you cannot do the usual [Ctrl]+[Delete] that usually does the same but deletes the word after the cursor. It is just a counterpart of [Ctrl]+[Backspace] so I think it would be logical to implement it too. Thanks!
